title: Microsoft Confirmed to Backup BitLocker Keys in Plain-text, Hands Them Over to Law Enforcement
description: Going against standard practice in the industry, Microsoft backs-up your BitLocker Recovery Keys in plain-text, rather than in an end-to-end encrypted form. Apple, on the other hand, backs-up your FileVault Recovery Key end-to-end encrypted as part of your keychain, rendering it entirely unreadable by them and, by extension, law enforcement.

sources.title: Microsoft Gave FBI Keys To Unlock Encrypted Data, Exposing Major Privacy Flaw

title: Canada Computers Website Compromised, Card-skimming Malware Injected
description: Canada Computers website was compromised by an attack who injected card-skimming malware on payment pages. Initially publicized on Reddit by a customer at least 18 days after initially injected, Canada Computers finally took action the same day and began notifying impacted customers 4 days later.
